title: In situ fabrication of all amorphous TiO2-coupled-MoSx photocatalysts for on-demand photocatalytic hydrogen production by using UV light
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,4907-4913
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01079E, Communication
Qian Dong, Yongxing Sun, Fang Wang, Zhengguo Zhang, Shixiong Min
An all amorphous TiO2-coupled-MoSx photocatalyst is successfully developed in situ for on-demand photocatalytic H2 evolution with excellent activity and stability.
